front.title: Practical Request for BGP Specification and Implementation

abstract.t: In 2007, a large scale incident have occurred multiple ISPs where anumber of BGP sessions were disconnected. This happened because ofthe different implementation of BGP error handling. Therefore, it isnecessary to classify the error processing of BGP to achieve stableoperation of BGP, and to define it clearly. This document describesto clarify the classification of BGP error handlings.
